Optimizers¶

Available optimization strategies for gradient averaging for Neural Networks in Master node.

class MMLL.optimizers.optimizer.GradientOptimizer¶

Bases: object

This class implements the different gradient optimizers, run at Master node.

abstract aggregate(model, list_gradients)¶

Aggregate the gradients received from a set of workers.

Parameters

  • model (NN_model) – Neural Network model object.

  • list_gradients (list) – List containing the gradients of the different workers.

class MMLL.optimizers.optimizer.SGD(learning_rate, momentum=0, nesterov=False)¶

Bases: MMLL.optimizers.optimizer.GradientOptimizer

This class implements the Stocastic Gradient Descent optimization approach, run at Master node. It inherits from GradientOptimizer.

Create a SGD instance.

Parameters

  • learning_rate (float) – Learning rate for training.

  • momentum (float) – Optimizer momentum.

  • nesterov (boolean) – Flag indicating if the momentum optimizer is Nesterov or not.

aggregate(model, list_gradients)¶

Aggregate the gradients received from a set of workers.

Parameters

  • model (NN_model) – Neural Network model object.

  • list_gradients (list) – List containing the gradients of the different workers.
